stem: A client with 'crushing' chest pain presents to the ED. Based on the documentation in the Serial 12-Lead ECG & Hemodynamic Crisis Log, which finding is the most predictive of high-mortality Left Main Coronary Artery (LMCA) occlusion?

tabs.title: ECG Evaluation
tabs.content:
Lead TypeFindingSignificance
Lead aVRST-segment ELEVATION > 1mmCritical finding
Leads V1 - V6Diffuse ST-segment DEPRESSIONGlobal ischemia
Lead I, II, IIIST-segment DEPRESSIONWidespread involvement

tabs.title: Vitals & Assessment
tabs.content:
Vitals: BP 78/42, HR 128. Skin is grey and diaphoretic.
Condition: Client is in overt cardiogenic shock. Reports 'Impending Doom.'

tabs.title: Cardiac Prep
tabs.content:
1. Activate Cath Lab - Stat.
2. Transcutaneous pacing - Prep at bedside.
3. Intra-aortic balloon pump (IABP) - Alert team.

options.text: ST-segment elevation in lead aVR with diffuse ST-depression elsewhere

rationale.correct: The most definitive ECG indicator of a **Left Main Coronary Artery (LMCA) occlusion (a1)**, often called the 'Widowmaker,' is **ST-elevation in lead aVR** accompanied by widespread/diffuse ST-depression in almost all other leads. Lead aVR 'looks down' into the heart from the right; ST-elevation here reflects global injury to the left ventricle because the main 'trunk' of the artery is blocked. This pattern has a extremely high mortality rate and requires immediate surgical or mechanical intervention (a1).
clinicalPearls: LMCA supplies ~75% of the left ventricle. If it blocks, the patient usually enters cardiogenic shock immediately.
Lead aVR is often ignored, but elevation there + depression in V1-V6 = 'Death in aVR.'
Treat like a triple-threat: Shock, Heart Block, and Heart Failure.

questionTrap.trap: Choosing 'Impending Doom' (a2) as the 'most predictive' finding.
questionTrap.howToOvercome: While psychologically predictive, the NCLEX looks for the **objective monitor/lab finding** that correlates to a specific anatomical failure. aVR elevation is the anatomical 'smoking gun' for the Left Main.

mnemonic.title: aVR is Real
mnemonic.expansion: aVR high? Left Main goodbye. (High urgency/High mortality).
